Models
======

The models package contains data structures that represent the core entities 
in the BusFlow system. All models follow Python naming conventions with 
PascalCase for class names.

User Model
----------

.. automodule:: app.models.user
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Bus Model
---------

.. automodule:: app.models.bus
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Booking Model
-------------

.. automodule:: app.models.booking
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
